query.statement:
SELECT A.POSID AS PJT, A.ZSITE_NM AS SITE_NM, '현장민원접수' AS MESGTITL, '' AS MESGDESC, (SELECT X.NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.POSID = A.POSID ORDER BY X.POSID , X.POSID_1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS PMNM,
A.ZMAN AS PERNO1, --'H2018900' AS PERNO1, '' AS PERNO, ('helco' || CAST(#G_USER_ID# AS CHAR(7)) || '@hdel.co.kr') AS USER
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS A
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.POSID = #PSPID#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
